content: Virtual Internship Platform
A platform that connects students with organizations that offer virtual internships. Students can apply for internships, gain practical experience, and apply their knowledge in real-world scenarios.
Access to virtual internships, Learning management system, Interactive training, Dedicated mentorship, Virtual networking events
Forage, InsideSherpa, ForMyInterns, Virtual Internships
Differentiates by providing access to dedicated mentorship for each student and virtual networking events to help them build relationships in their industry.
Online Professional Certification
An online certification program that offers hands-on training and simulation-based scenarios for students to apply their theoretical knowledge.
Interactive courses, Simulation-based learning, Live sessions with industry experts, Assessments and feedback, Virtual labs
Coursera, edX, Udacity, Simplilearn
Differentiates by providing simulation-based learning and virtual labs for students to gain practical experience.
Online Case Study Platform
An online platform that offers access to a library of real-world business case studies. Students can analyze and evaluate these cases to apply their theoretical knowledge to practical scenarios.
Access to a library of case studies, Real-world business problems, Interactive analyses and evaluations, Expert feedback, Customizable learning paths
Harvard Business Review, CaseCentre, Ivey Business School, Darden School of Business
Differentiates by providing expert feedback on student's analyses and evaluations and customizable learning paths based on their progress.
Virtual Skills Workshop

A virtual workshop that offers students the opportunity to learn and apply practical skills in a simulated environment. Students can work on real-world projects with industry leaders and apply their knowledge to practical scenarios.
Interactive training, Access to industry experts, Virtual project-based learning, Dedicated mentorship, Virtual networking
General Assembly, Skillshare, Udemy, Masterclass
Differentiates by providing access to dedicated mentorship for each student and virtual networking events to help them build relationships in their industry.
pain_point_description: online courses may not provide enough opportunities for students to gain practical experience and apply their knowledge to real-world scenarios. this may leave them with theoretical knowledge only, which may not be helpful in their career
